keyMoments.title: Meeting the Straw Hat Pirates
keyMoments.description: Kokoro meets the Straw Hat Pirates at Shift Station after they nearly collide with the Puffing Tom sea train. She introduces herself and her granddaughter Chimney.
keyMoments.significance: First meeting between Kokoro and the Straw Hats, establishing her as a helpful guide who will play a crucial role in the Water 7 and Enies Lobby arcs.
keyMoments.quote: Nagagagaga! Welcome to Shift Station, young pirates!

keyMoments.title: Explains the Sea Train System
keyMoments.description: Kokoro provides detailed information about the Puffing Tom sea train system, explaining how it connects Water 7 to other islands including Enies Lobby.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes crucial information about the sea train that becomes central to the upcoming arcs. Shows Kokoro's knowledge and connection to the region's infrastructure.

keyMoments.title: Gives Introduction to Iceburg
keyMoments.description: Kokoro provides the Straw Hats with a letter of introduction to Iceburg, the mayor of Water 7 and president of Galley-La Company.
keyMoments.significance: Facilitates the crew's entry into Water 7 society and their meeting with Iceburg, which drives the plot forward.

relationships.description: Kokoro is Chimney's grandmother and guardian. She raises Chimney at Shift Station.

evolutionMoments.description: Kokoro introduces Chimney to the Straw Hats as her granddaughter.

reveals.information: Station master at Shift Station for the sea train
Has knowledge of Water 7 and provides introduction to Iceburg

keyMoments.title: Meeting the Straw Hat Pirates
keyMoments.description: Chimney meets the Straw Hat Pirates at Shift Station alongside her grandmother Kokoro. She introduces her pet rabbit Gonbe, insisting that he is a cat.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of Chimney, an energetic and cheerful child who becomes a recurring character in the Water 7 saga. Her misidentification of Gonbe provides comic relief.

abilities.description: Due to her mermaid heritage, Chimney is an exceptionally good swimmer despite appearing fully human.

relationships.description: Chimney is Kokoro's granddaughter. She lives with her grandmother at Shift Station.

evolutionMoments.description: Chimney is introduced as Kokoro's granddaughter.

relationships.description: Chimney owns Gonbe, a rabbit she insists is a cat. They are constant companions.

evolutionMoments.description: Chimney introduces Gonbe as her pet 'cat' to the Straw Hats.

reveals.information: Lighthearted, hyperactive, and adventurous child with innocent curiosity
Believes her pet rabbit Gonbe is actually a cat

keyMoments.title: Introduction as Chimney's 'Cat'
keyMoments.description: Gonbe is introduced as Chimney's pet. Despite clearly being a rabbit with long ears and a cotton tail, Chimney insists he is a cat. Gonbe makes cat-like 'nya' sounds despite being a rabbit.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of Gonbe, whose species confusion provides ongoing comic relief throughout the Water 7 saga. The running gag of his identity becomes a memorable aspect of the arc.

relationships.description: Gonbe is Chimney's pet companion. He accompanies her everywhere and mimics her actions.

evolutionMoments.description: Gonbe is introduced as Chimney's pet.

reveals.information: A rabbit who makes cat sounds and is believed to be a cat by his owner Chimney

keyMoments.title: Giant Frog Swimming Front Crawl
keyMoments.description: Yokozuna is spotted by Zoro swimming the front crawl (freestyle) across the ocean. The crew is amazed by the sight of a giant frog swimming in a human style rather than the natural breaststroke.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of Yokozuna, who becomes a recurring character connected to Franky. The humorous swimming style and his later attempts to stop the sea train establish his character and foreshadow Franky's introduction.

abilities.description: Yokozuna swims using the front crawl (freestyle) technique, an unusual and humorous contrast to the natural breaststroke swimming of typical frogs.

reveals.information: Can swim using the front crawl stroke despite being a frog
